publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-723 Jackie Baillie: Alcohol Awareness Week—That the Parliament welcomes Scotland’s first ever Alcohol Awareness Week; commends the coming together of the alcohol industry, health professionals and the voluntary sector with government to raise alcohol consumers’ unit awareness, and congratulates Chivas Brothers and the Scotch Whisky Association for their part in this campaign to help promote responsible drinking in Scotland.

S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Sarah Boyack*, Sandra White*, Trish Godman*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*, Elaine Murray*, Kenneth Gibson*, John Park*, Claire Baker*, Alasdair Allan*, John Lamont*, Mike Pringle*, Marlyn Glen*, Cathie Craigie*
S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Mary Mulligan*, Jackson Carlaw*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-723 Jackie Baillie: Alcohol Awareness Week—That the Parliament welcomes Scotland’s first ever Alcohol Awareness Week; commends the coming together of the alcohol industry, health professionals and the voluntary sector with government to raise alcohol consumers’ unit awareness, and congratulates Chivas Brothers and the Scotch Whisky Association for their part in this campaign to help promote responsible drinking in Scotland. Supported by: Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Nanette Milne, Elizabeth Smith, Sarah Boyack, Sandra White, Trish Godman, Karen Gillon, Bill Butler, Elaine Murray, Kenneth Gibson, John Park, Claire Baker, Alasdair Allan, John Lamont, Mike Pringle, Marlyn Glen, Cathie Craigie, Mary Mulligan, Jackson Carlaw, Gil Paterson, Des McNulty*
S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Jamie Stone*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Christine Grahame*
S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Tom McCabe*
S3M-723 Alcohol Awareness Week (lodged on 30 October 2007) Peter Peacock*, Rhoda Grant*
